name: Super Car Plane!
description:
Take to the sky in your car, and see how far you can glide!

The aim of the game is to get as far as possible!

Tilt your phone or tablet to control the car, and tap the screen to boost.
Just make sure that you watch out for the birds.. or anything else that may be flying around!

Game features:
• Facebook - Compete against your friends and other players worldwide!
• New cars - Unlock awesome new cars!
• Powerups - Earn super powerups!

Join our communities:
https://www.facebook.com/SuperCarPlane
https://twitter.com/SuperCarPlane
https://instagram.com/SuperCarPlane
